pjmedia_wave_hdr Struct Reference
File Formats » WAVE Header

#include <wave.h>

   pj_uint32_t   data
 
   pj_uint32_t   len

Detailed Description

This file describes the simpler/canonical version of a WAVE file. It does not support the full RIFF format specification.

See also
pjmedia_wave_hdr
